001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Matrix;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureMatrices;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
011
012public class VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N extends Number> implements LinearModelOptimizer<N>, GradientDescentOptimizer<N> {
013
014    private boolean debugOutput;
015
016    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
017    private EpochCompletionListener<N> epochCompletionListener;
018    private int epochs = 1000;
019    private float learningRate = 0.1f;
020    private Interceptor<N> interceptor = GradientDescentOptimizer.nullInterceptor();
021
022    public VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
023        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
024    }
025
026    @Override
027    public int getEpochs() {
028        return epochs;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public void setEpochs(int epochs) {
033        this.epochs = epochs;
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public float getLearningRate() {
038        return learningRate;
039    }
040
041    @Override
042    public void setLearningRate(float learningRate) {
043        this.learningRate = learningRate;
044    }
045
046    @Override
047    public EpochCompletionListener<N> getEpochCompletionListener() {
048        return epochCompletionListener;
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public void setEpochCompletionListener(EpochCompletionListener<N> epochCompletionListener) {
053        this.epochCompletionListener = epochCompletionListener;
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
058        return typeSupport;
059    }
060
061    public boolean isDebugOutput() {
062        return debugOutput;
063    }
064
065    public void setDebugOutput(boolean debugOutput) {
066        this.debugOutput = debugOutput;
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void setOptimalWeights(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainSet) {
071        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = regression.getCurrentNumberType();
072        if (debugOutput) {
073            System.out.println("Number type = " + typeSupport.name());
074        }
075
076        N[] values = typeSupport.createArray(trainSet.size());
077        for (int i = 0; i < values.length; i++) {
078            values[i] = trainSet.samples().get(i).targetOutputs()[0];
079        }
080        TypedVector<N> y = Vectors.of(typeSupport, values).transpose();
081        if (debugOutput) {
082            y.print("y");
083        }
084        Matrix<N> designMatrix = FeatureMatrices.create(regression.getFeatureExtractor(), trainSet);
085        if (debugOutput) {
086            designMatrix.print("Î¦");
087        }
088
089        N learningRate = typeSupport.valueOf(this.learningRate);
090        N trainingSetSizeInverse = typeSupport.divide(typeSupport.one(), typeSupport.valueOf(trainSet.size()));
091
092        for (int e = 1; e <= epochs; e++) {
093            N[] parameters = regression.getParameters();
094            Vector<N> thetas = Vectors.of(regression.getCurrentNumberType(), parameters).transpose();
095            if (debugOutput) {
096                thetas.print("Î¸");
097            }
098            Vector<N> error = designMatrix.multiply(thetas).substract(y);
099            if (debugOutput) {
100                error.print("Error");
101            }
102            Vector<N> adjustment = interceptor.interceptGradients(e, regression, trainSet, this, designMatrix.transpose().multiply(error).multiply(trainingSetSizeInverse)).multiply(learningRate);
103            if (debugOutput) {
104                adjustment.print("Adjustment");
105            }
106            thetas = thetas.substract(adjustment);
107            regression.setParameters(thetas.asArray());
108            if (epochCompletionListener != null) {
109                epochCompletionListener.epochCompleted(e, regression, trainSet, this);
110            }
111        }
112    }
113
114    @Override
115    public void setInterceptor(Interceptor<N> interceptor) {
116        this.interceptor = interceptor == null ? GradientDescentOptimizer.nullInterceptor() : interceptor;
117    }
118
119    @Override
120    public Interceptor<N> getInterceptor() {
121        return interceptor;
122    }
123}
